description: I am a Computer Information & Science student at the University of Pennsylvania. Bringing experience from coursework and internships, I have developed expertise in front-end and back-end development, cloud infrastructure, and generative AI applications.
detailOrQuote: I am passionate about leveraging software engineering and machine learning to create impactful, scalable solutions. Beyond technical work, I have enjoyed contributing as a Teaching Assistant, where I've improved AI bot responses, developed MOOC content, and led TA onboarding. With hands-on experience in modern software development tools and frameworks, I'm excited to continue pushing the boundaries of innovation in software development and AI.
